title: Just bought a new computer, error 004 and other various issues with patch?
body:
I just purchased a used desktop. I am pretty new to LoL, however I'm pretty experienced with computers and I really don't know what to do. 

Here are the specs if it helps.

HP Pavillion HPE
Windows 7
12 GB DDR3 Ram
600 GB HD
+ 200 GB HD
AMD RADEON 6570 
i5 Quad Core 3.0 Ghz

I Install the Legacy Client just fine, and I update to the new client just fine as well, but when it patches, the computer will get to anywhere between 30-90% and then give me an error 004. 

I am plugged into the internet via Ethernet cable, and I've been through the computer. It is clean and updated. 

Please help! I just want to play League on my day off. :(

replies.body: Eeeeeeep days Once the patcher gets to the 33-90% mark, it starts to download all the new patch files. Seeing that error 004 is a pretty good sign that something is interrupting your connection somewhere along the way. Let's cover all our bases by going through the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues). Let me know if you have any troubles!
